summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Quick ID Reader Phase 3 features - all backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Successfully validated duplicate detection, audit trail, bulk scan improvements, and all new UI components.
passed_tests: ✅ Backend: Health endpoint (200 OK)
✅ Backend: Dashboard stats with full structure
✅ Backend: Scan endpoint with AI integration (4s response time)
✅ Backend: Duplicate detection API - returns duplicates when id_number matches
✅ Backend: Guest creation with duplicate_detected response and force_create bypass
✅ Backend: Guest CRUD with original_extracted_data field storage
✅ Backend: Check-in/check-out operations create audit logs
✅ Backend: Audit trail endpoints return field-level diffs
✅ Backend: Recent audit logs across all guests
✅ Backend: Export functionality (JSON and CSV)
✅ Frontend: Dashboard with KPI cards and recent guests display
✅ Frontend: Bulk scan page with Otomatik Çıkarım toggle (Phase 3)
✅ Frontend: Keyboard shortcuts display (Ctrl+S, Ctrl+R, Esc) (Phase 3)
✅ Frontend: Bulk scan counter showing '0 Misafir'
✅ Frontend: Guest list with search functionality
✅ Frontend: Guest detail page with Denetim İzi (Audit Trail) section (Phase 3)
✅ Frontend: Check-in/check-out buttons create audit entries
✅ Frontend: Edit functionality creates audit logs with field changes
✅ Frontend: Navigation sidebar working on all pages
✅ Frontend: Turkish language UI elements throughout
✅ Integration: Full duplicate detection flow (backend detects, frontend handles)
✅ Integration: Audit trail display shows actions and field changes
✅ Integration: Real-time status updates between backend and frontend

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components, Phase 3 features, and navigation working)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (duplicate detection, audit trail, bulk scan workflows)
